pr_title: XML option to show where a flag will respawn at next.

timeline.author: Electroid
Electroid

timeline.message:
Added an xml option to show what post the flag will respawn to next. This change is intended to help KoTF play better.

Signed-off-by: mrcookie <athertonmook@gmail.com>

Make show-respawn-on-pickup default to true. If a net defines a respawn post, show-respawn-on-pickup will be set to false.

Signed-off-by: mrcookie <athertonmook@gmail.com>

Add XML option to where a flag will respawn at next
